verses.verse: The <S%H5036>fool<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, There is no <S%H430>God<s%>. They are <S%H7843>corrupt<s%>, they have done <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5949>works<s%>, there is none that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> looked <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> upon the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, to <S%H7200>see<s%> if <S%H3426>there<s%> were any that did <S%H7919>understand<s%>, and <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
They are all gone <S%H5493>aside<s%>, they are all <S%H3162>together<s%> become <S%H444>filthy<s%>: there is none that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>, <S%H259>no<s%>, not one.

Have all the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%>? who eat <S%H398>up<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H7121>call<s%> not upon the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
There were they in <S%H6343>great<s%> <S%H6342>fear<s%>: for <S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
You have <S%H954>shamed<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is his <S%H4268>refuge<s%>.

Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were come out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>! when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> brings <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%>.
